main.subtitle: Hi there, I'm
main.title: Rashadul Islam
main.description: I'm a Frontend Web Developer with a strong passion for creating error-free, responsive websites that ensure 100% client satisfaction. Skilled in JavaScript and TypeScript, I work with modern frameworks like React.js, Next.js, and Vue.js, and design using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap. I also have experience with backend technologies like Node.js, Express.js, and databases including MongoDB, Mongoose, SQL, and PostgreSQL. I use tools like Git, Firebase, Cloudinary, JetBrains, and cPanel to streamline development. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and improve my craft.

2025.title: Full Stack Web Developer
2025.description: Developed full-stack applications with Tailwind, JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB.

2024.title: Junior Frontend Developer
2024.description: Built responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, and NodeJS.

2020.title: Web Development Level - 4
2020.description: Developed web applications and gained proficiency in HTML, CSS, and PHP.

2022.title: IT Manager
2022.description: Managed IT infrastructure and led a team of developers to implement key technology solutions.

projects.title: Tourisom & Travels
projects.description: A full-stack web application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), offering seamless booking, destination exploration, and user management. Features include dynamic tour packages, secure authentication, a user-friendly interface, and responsive design for an enhanced travel planning experience.

projects.title: Trade Ventures
projects.description: A responsive frontend application built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, designed for seamless user interaction and dynamic content management. The project offers a clean UI, fast performance, and optimized navigation for enhanced user experience. It includes modern design principles and responsive layouts, ensuring accessibility across all devices.

projects.title: SSL Garments System
projects.description: The SSL Garments System (Frontend) is a dynamic and responsive web application designed to manage garment production processes. Developed using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, this frontend interface enables users to interact with the garment management system, track orders, view inventory, and manage production workflows. The application features a user-friendly design with a focus on performance, offering a seamless experience across various devices.

projects.title: Learning Management System (LMS)
projects.description: A fully responsive and dynamic Learning Management System built with React for the front end. It offers user authentication, course browsing, enrollment, and video lessons. Designed to simplify online learning with a clean UI, intuitive navigation, and integrated payment support. Admins can manage courses, instructors, and students efficiently.

projects.title: Digital Clock
projects.description: A simple yet elegant digital clock built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It dynamically displays the current time and updates every second in real-time. The project focuses on DOM manipulation and time-based functions, making it a great beginner-level JavaScript project.

projects.title: Functional portfollio Website
projects.description: About Responsive portfolio website built from a Figma design using Next.js (or Astro) and Tailwind CSS. Features include SEO optimization, accessibility, animations, and performance tuning with 95+ PageSpeed score. Deployed on Vercel/Netlify with full documentation.
projects.techStack: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS3, Next.js, TypeScript

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: This is a simple yet effective password generator built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can generate strong, random passwords with customizable options for length and character types. It features a clean user interface and real-time password display, ideal for basic security needs.

projects.title: A to Z Ecommerce
projects.description: A full-featured ecommerce platform built from scratch using the Frontend. The project includes user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, secure checkout, and order tracking. It also features an admin dashboard for managing inventory, orders, and customers. Optimized for both desktop and mobile experiences.

projects.title: Airbook
projects.description: Airbook is a full-stack web application designed to simulate an airline booking experience. Users can explore flight options, book tickets, and manage bookings. The frontend is developed using React for a responsive UI, while the backend uses Node.js and MongoDB to handle data management and authentication.

2020.title: SSC

2021.title: HSC
2021.description: Passed Higher Secondary Certificate specializing in Science, with strong interest in mathematics and ICT.

2023.title: Diploma in Eng:
2023.description: Gained hands-on experience in programming, networking, and database management during a 4-year diploma program.

2025.title: BSC
2025.description: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering focusing on full-stack development and modern technologies.

whyChooseMeSection.title: Why Choose Me
whyChooseMeSection.description: I provide high-quality web solutions tailored to your business needs. With a strong focus on modern technologies, clean and efficient code, responsive design, and a seamless user experience, I ensure every project delivers real value. Whether you're a local business or an international client, you can count on professionalism, performance, and clear communication at every stage.
whyChooseMeSection.contactdescription: Have a project in mind? Let‚Äôs bring your vision to life

features.description: Your site will look and function consistently across all major browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

features.title: Client Training & Support

articles.title: Mastering React Hooks
articles.description: Learn how to effectively use React Hooks like useState, useEffect, and custom hooks to write cleaner and reusable components.

articles.title: Next.js Server Components Explained
articles.description: Understand the power of server components in Next.js and how they help optimize performance by rendering on the server.

faq.faqDescription: Here are some common questions and answers to help you understand my services better.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: I specialize in modern front-end development using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I also provide UI/UX design, responsive layouts, performance optimization, and full-stack web development support when needed.

items.question: Do you work with international clients?
items.answer: Yes, I collaborate with clients worldwide including the US, UK, Canada, Australia, and others. I focus on clear communication, time-zone flexibility, and timely delivery.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: My tech stack includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, MongoDB, and modern tools like Git, Figma, and Vite.

items.question: How can I contact you?
items.answer: You can reach me via the contact form on my website, or directly through my email and LinkedIn. I‚Äôm responsive and open to discussing your project needs.

items.question: Can you help with performance optimization?
items.answer: Absolutely. I conduct audits and offer optimization services to boost speed, Core Web Vitals, SEO, and overall user experience.

items.question: Are you available for freelance or contract work?
items.answer: Yes, I‚Äôm available for freelance and contract-based projects. Whether it‚Äôs a landing page, a SaaS dashboard, or a full website, I‚Äôd love to hear about it.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: It depends on the project scope, but a typical website or dashboard usually takes between 1 to 3 weeks. I always aim for timely delivery without compromising quality.

items.question: Do you work with design tools like Figma or Adobe XD?
items.answer: Yes, I regularly convert Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch designs into responsive, pixel-perfect, production-ready websites using modern frontend frameworks.
